effect_entries.effect: User's [type]{mechanic:type} changes to the [type]{mechanic:type} of one of its moves, selected at random.  []{move:hidden-power} and []{move:weather-ball} are treated as []{type:normal}.  Only moves with a different [type]{mechanic:type} are eligible, and []{move:curse} is never eligible.  If the user has no suitable moves, this move will [fail]{mechanic:fail}.
effect_entries.short_effect: User's type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
